DOC.brief_summary: This open follow-up clinical trial evaluate sustain efficacy safety ANTG-ASC injection 4 month ( 6 month final dose injection ) Phase II clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Study Autologous Adipose-derived Stem Cells ( ANTG-ASC ) Complex Fistula ( ANTG-ASC-211 )
